## setWorkDir() function

Sets the library working directory.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function setWorkDir(dirPath: string): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

dirPath


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The working directory path


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

This function has no effect if the working directory has already been set.
